channel.title: Get Ready 2 Rock
channel.description:
Your band has a big gig coming up, and you'll need to keep your rockstar antics in check if you want to keep getting more shows. But on the other hand, what's the point of being in a band if you can't live on the wild side? Make a date with stardom in this GM-less, Powered by the Apocalypse game of musical mayhem.
This session is scheduled for three hours. It will be recorded and posted with players' permission.
We will be playing Get Ready 2 Rock, which is currently in playtest. Attendance at all sessions is encouraged but not required. You must RSVP for each session you want to attend. No prior knowledge of the system is required.
The X card, lines and veils, and the open door policy will be in effect. This event abides by the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy.
[date=2020-07-06 time=21:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-07-06 time=23:59:00 timezone="America/New_York"] Session 1: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7zVGBrufYtII-wC8GW [date=2020-07-13 time=21:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-07-13 time=23:59:00 timezone="America/New_York"] Session 2: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7zVUthbatSTBlBEjyf [date=2020-07-20 time=21:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-07-20 time=23:59:00 timezone="America/New_York"] Session 3: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7zVb9K3-mPGjGvOudX [date=2020-07-27 time=21:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-07-27 time=23:59:00 timezone="America/New_York"] Session 4: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7zWgazJmcagf3yBKyA

item.title: Get Ready 2 Rock
item.dc:creator: @Stentor_Danielson
item.description:
@Stentor_Danielson wrote:

Your band has a big gig coming up, and you’ll need to keep your rockstar antics in check if you want to keep getting more shows. But on the other hand, what’s the point of being in a band if you can’t live on the wild side? Make a date with stardom in this GM-less, Powered by the Apocalypse game of musical mayhem.

This session is scheduled for three hours. It will be recorded and posted with players’ permission.

We will be playing Get Ready 2 Rock, which is currently in playtest. Attendance at all sessions is encouraged but not required. You must RSVP for each session you want to attend. No prior knowledge of the system is required.

The X card, lines and veils, and the open door policy will be in effect. This event abides by the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy.
